say.label: Welcome to another Snakes And Ladders tease
But this time it's circles.
This is no ordinary snakes and ladders tease
Normally you follow a linear path up to end
With ladders that let you skip fields and snakes that make you move back
In this tease you do not follow one path but move in circles
But because one circle is boring it is three instead
One small inner circle
a bigger one around it
and the biggest one surrounding the other two
You will start in the inner circle at field 1
Ladders let you advance onto the next ring
Snakes force you to go back one ring
The purple fields reverse your moving direction - the good old uno reverse card
Since it is a circle you need to directly land on the fields to activate their effects
Simply passing over a ladder is not enough to advance
Don't worry I did the math (https://github.com/BrightSprinkler/SnakesAndLetterWheelProbabilities)
90% of 1.000.000 simulated games were able to finish within the first 200 dice rolls
So it should not take you forever ;)
To end the tease and earn your orgasm you will need to land on field 25 - landing on it using the ladder does not count tho.
That's it! Simple right!
